args:
echo '--- Stage 1: Core Isolation Test ---'; \
     echo '1. Verifying Hostname Isolation:'; \
     hostname; \
     echo '
2. Verifying Filesystem Isolation:'; \
     ls / | grep -E 'bin|etc|lib'; \
     echo '
3. Verifying Process Isolation:'; \
     ps aux | grep -v 'PID'; \
     echo '
--- Test Complete ---'
